title: Gnome (Mourner Headquarters)

properties.value: The Gnome (real name unknown) is a character, who is being tortured on a rack by the Mourners in Mourner Headquarters in West Ardougne. He is involved in Mourning's End Part I, where it is revealed that he can fix a device needed to re-dye some sick-looking sheep. The player will threaten to take out his wisdom teeth, which he replies that gnome do not have any wisdom. Gnome
Released19 July 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceGnome

Song of the Elves

ExamineA fearful Gnome.

Map
Advanced data
NPC ID5309

The Gnome (real name unknown) is a character, who is being tortured on a rack by the Mourners in Mourner Headquarters in West Ardougne. He is involved in Mourning's End Part I, where it is revealed that he can fix a device needed to re-dye some sick-looking sheep. The player will threaten to take out his wisdom teeth, which he replies that gnome do not have any wisdom. By using a feather on him to tickle his feet and bribing him with toad crunchies, he will ask the player for a piece of soft leather and a magic log to repair it.

In Song of the Elves, the Gnome is still kept hostage in the Mourner Headquarters when the revolutionaries break in and kill the Mourners. He cheers the revolutionaries on and is promptly freed by them. Following the end of the quest, he still remains in the headquarters, searching for any useful items the Mourners may have left behind.
